bioghist.p: Edwin Wolf 2nd (1911-1991) was a librarian, bibliophile, author, historian, Franklin scholar, and civic leader. Wolf worked with Dr. A.S.W. Rosenbach for nearly twenty years, compiling many of the company's catalogs. He was the Curator of the Library Company of Philadelphia from 1953 to 1955, and its Librarian from 1955 to 1984.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of brochures, invitations, and announcements gathered by Edwin Wolf and Library Company staff (1979-1989). The materials are largely related to events and programs of Philadelphia area cultural institutions, with some pieces coming from Boston, New York, and other locations. The collection also includes a very small number of materials addressed to Edwin Wolf.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
